General.Name: Altima Resources Ltd
General.Description: Altima Resources Ltd., a junior energy company, engages in exploration and development of petroleum and natural gas in Canada. It intends to focus on acquiring undervalued oil and gas assets; and exploiting existing low risk high return asset enhancement. The company also engages in acquiring, developing and exploring for light gravity oil and liquids rich high impact gas targets. Altima Resources Ltd. was incorporated in 2003 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 595 Howe Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 2T5
